name: A New Era of "Cheers": Season Six Quiz | Television | 25 Questions

questions.text: Rebecca loved Sam when she first met him.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Rebecca didn't like Sam when she first met him. First of all, he couldn't stand having her in charge of what used to be his bar, and secondly, his reputation as a babe hound annoyed her.

questions.text: In "'I' On Sports" what kind of injury does Sam mention in his rap?
questions.explanation:
groin injury.

	"A g-g-roin a g-g-groin a g-groin injury."

questions.text: What relative of Eddie's despises Carla?
questions.explanation:
his mother.

	She thinks Rebecca is Carla and is ready to welcome her, but when she sees the real Carla she hates her.

questions.text: Does Carla marry Eddie?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	They get married a minute to late so Carla wants to have in annulled, but at the end everything works out.

questions.text: In "The Crane Mutiny," who does Frasier think is in love with him?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Norm and Cliff are playing mind games and decide to make Frasier think of cheating on Lilith with Rebecca. He ends up making a fool of himself.

questions.text: Where does Rebecca say she's from in "Paint Your Office"?
questions.explanation:
San Diego.

	She also says she has a sister who is better than her.

questions.text: How much is Cliff's mom offered for her house?
questions.explanation:
$250,000.

	Cliff doesn't want to move because of memories of his home.

questions.text: On the episode entitled "Bidding on the Boys," who does Lilith bid $2000 on?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Lilith wanted to get back at Frasier by going out with Sam.

questions.text: In "Pudd'nhead Boyd," what famous author was Woody dressed as?
questions.explanation:
Mark Twain.

	He was hoping to play Mark Twain in the play, and was the understudy. He had the costume on at "Cheers" to "be ready to go on at a moment's notice."

questions.text: Who played Evan Drake?
questions.explanation:
Tom Skerritt.

	Tom Skerritt is best known for his role as Sheriff Jimmy Brock in the drama series "Picket Fences".

questions.text: When Rebecca wants to quit smoking what does she promise Sam she'll do if she smokes one more cigarette?
questions.correct: "I will go to bed with you."
options: "I will do a striptease act for you."
questions.explanation:
"I will go to bed with you."

	Frasier told her the best way to quit is to do the most awful thing she can think of if she doesn't quit. The worst thing in the world to her is having to have sex with Sam Malone.

questions.text: In "Christmas Cheers" what does Sam give Rebecca for Christmas?
questions.explanation:
diamond earrings.

	He meant to give her ear muffs, but gave her the wrong package. Of course, he then thought he could use it to his adventage, so she got the earrings.

questions.text: Who guest stars as himself in "Woody For Hire Meets Norman of the Apes"?
questions.explanation:
Robert Urich.

	Robert Urich played Spenser in "Spencer For Hire".

questions.text: What expensive item does Rebecca break in "And God Created Woodman"?
questions.explanation:
vase.

	She dropped the vase and it broke when it hit the hard floor.

questions.text: In "A Tale of Two Cuties," how is Laurie related to Evan Drake?
questions.explanation:
daughter.

	Drake didn't want anyone to know Laurie was his daughter so she wouldn't get special treatment. Instead Rebecca thinks it's his girlfriend, and being in love with Drake herself Rebecca does the only logical thing and punches Laurie out.

questions.text: In "Yacht of Fools," what is the name of the woman Sam says is his sister?
questions.explanation:
Julie.

	Julie was played by Dorothy Parke. Parke played Amanda Reed in the 1986 movie "Hot Shots".

questions.text: Frasier asks Lilith to promise him two things in "To All the Girls I Loved Before." One was "You'll never leave me for another." What was the other?
questions.correct: "You won't throw up on me in the cab"
options: "You'll put your hair down more often"
"You let me be with other women"
questions.explanation:
"You won't throw up on me in the cab".

	Lilith gave Frasier a chance to back out of getting married. When he didn't call she started drinking. By the time they got together she was quite drunk. Frasier: "Lilith, I want to marry you anyway." Lilith: For the rest of my life I'll never forget those words: Lilith, I want to marry you anyway."

questions.text: From which continent did Drake return unexpectadly in "Let Sleeping Drakes Lie"?
questions.explanation:
Europe.

	Rebecca: "What if Evan comes back unexpectedly from Europe?" Norm: "Rebecca people don't come back unexpectedly from Europe. They come back unexpectedly from a walk or the market, but they don't come back unexpectedly from Europe." (a noise is heard) Rebecca: "What's that?" Norm: "It's Drake he's back unexpectedly from Europe."

questions.text: What is the name of the critic who gives "Cheers" a good review in "Airport V"?
questions.explanation:
Murray Treadwell.

	Murray Treadwell was played by Peter Elbling. Elbing was one of the writers for the movie "Honey, I Shrunk the Kids."

questions.text: In "The Sam in the Grey Flannel Suit" why is Sam made a corporate executive?
options: No one else wants the job.
questions.explanation:
He's a ringer.

	Rebecca is really annoyed he got the job when she was more qualified. Then she relishes in the joy of telling him he's only a ringer. However, when he talks about how happy his mom was to hear he got the job, she doesn't want to tell him, but feels she has to.

questions.text: What is the first prize in the raffle in "Our Hourly Bread"?
questions.explanation:
Trip to the Caribbean.

	Woody doesn't know if the number he called is 66 or 99.

questions.text: What news causes Carla to become depressed in "Slumber Party Massacre"?
questions.correct: She's going to become a grandmother
options: Her mother - in - law is coming to visit
questions.explanation:
She's going to become a grandmother.

	Rebecca, Lilith and Dorothy throw her a slumber party to try to cheer her up.

questions.text: Which baseball player guest starred on the episode entitled "Bar Wars"?
questions.explanation:
Wade Boggs.

	Wade Boggs played with the Red Sox from 1982 to 1992.

questions.text: Who ends up kissing Rebecca in "The Big Kiss-Off"?
questions.explanation:
Neither.

	Rebecca finds out about the contest and she tricks Woody and Sam into kissing each other.

questions.text: In "Backseat Becky, Upfront", what country is Evan Drake going to?
questions.explanation:
Japan.

	This is the last episode that Evan Drake was in.
